att2.com.wrc.aas

Class StudentHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • att2.com.wrc.aas.StudentHolder

  • public class StudentHolder
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    Created by Aurghya on 24-03-2018. ViewHolder for student_view Handle with care, this class handles the count of attendance and also the checkbox for the attendance, messing this up will result in a lot of unwanted bugs.

      • setCheck

        public void setCheck(java.lang.String roll,
                     java.lang.String date,
                     java.lang.String classId,
                     java.lang.String periodId)
        Handles the checkbox checked status when first loading the view or after checking an attendance.
        Parameters:
        roll - The Roll number or the Unique ID of the student.
        date - The date of the attendance to be added or edited.
        classId - The class ID of the class / the subject.
        periodId - The period ID, normally starting with P, like P1, P2 etc.

      • updateCheck

        public void updateCheck(java.lang.String roll,
                        java.lang.String date,
                        java.lang.String classId,
                        java.lang.String periodId,
                        boolean status)
        Updates the attendance and the attendance count in the database. DO NOT CHANGE THIS METHOD, it will mess up the whole system of how attendance is counted and will probably result in an infinite loop.
        Parameters:
        roll - The Roll number or the Unique ID of the student.
        date - The date of the attendance to be added or edited.
        classId - The class ID of the class / the subject.
        periodId - The period ID, normally starting with P, like P1, P2 etc.
        status - Status of the checkbox, boolean.
